name: Hyper Space Escape
description:
Unlock characters with different abilities to go further and further. But it will not be easy, the vehicles that go against you will go faster and faster.

I'm still developing it. So any idea, comment or feedback is more than welcome.

I started with the project for the Blackthornprod GAME JAM # 3.

You play only pressing space, because less is more.

FOR WINDOWS, DOWNLOAD THE HYPER SPACE ESCAPE_ALPHA (WIN).ZIP  The other windows file is old. But in case of any problem, it is playable (but more difficult).
